channel.title: Need help quick please
channel.description: im trying to make a quest following a tut i found but i dont understand about the cases... for the people u need to talk to do u make the case # the same as the npcs ID? or wat and which spot of client.java do i put the case in? Please help thanks

item.title: Need help quick please
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

k but i have case 1339 in here and it says its hans and it is when u talk to hans hes set up as case 1339 not case 0… so how does 1339 connect to case 0?

[quote] case 1339: /Hans/
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Welcome To Ts Scape!”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue”, 4886);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 1340:
sendFrame171(1, 2465);
sendFrame171(0, 2468);
sendFrame126(“Select an Option”, 2460);
sendFrame126(“Thanks!”, 2461);
sendFrame126(“Butt hole”, 2462);
sendFrame164(2459);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
[\quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2008, 09:01:32 pm[/size][hr]still need help pleasee!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help quick please
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

Asuming I read what you said correctly yes.

switch (npcdialogue) { case 1: //man etc.. break; //stops from continuing default: //error.... }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help quick please
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

so i would put it in switch(npcdialogue) with the case number being npcs ID?

item.title: Need help quick please
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

switch (integer) { case etc.. }
The “cases” you say are inside switch statements, so there is more then 1 switch statement.

Read full topic
